participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Confident and a bit boastful, Jake enjoys sharing his achievements with others.
participant_1.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.

participant_2.name: Sarah Mitchell
participant_2.personality: Warm-hearted and enthusiastic, Sarah loves to talk about her passions and experiences.
participant_2.background: i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. my favorite season is winter. i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats.

content.text: You know what I’m actually a celebrity
I won gold medal in1992 olympics
I’m additionally hat collector I have over 100 hats
